Biography

Career Notes: Two-year letterwinner … Closed out ECU career posting a two-year 73.83 stroke average … Appeared in 20 events (60 rounds) … Recorded one Top 10 event coming at the Ironwood Collegiate Classic (t6th) during final year … Carded rounds of 72 or better 20 times (69 or lower on seven occasions) … Shot career-low 54-hole score of 210 at the Irish Creek Intercollegiate as a senior.

As a Graduate Student (2022-23): Earned second letter with the program after participating in 11 events … Posted a team second-best 74.06 stroke average … Recorded three top 15 finishes which included a share of sixth place at the Ironwood Collegiate Classic (215) … Also finished tied for 13th at the Grandover Collegiate (213, season-low score) and was tied for 14th at the Wexford Intercollegiate (220) … Shot 72 or better in a round 12 times … Carded three rounds of 69 (all third-round action) at the Grandover Collegiate, Wexford Intercollegiate and Cutter Creek Intercollegiate … One of five starters at The American Championships where he shot a 220 (10-over) … Carded three of the team’s lowest 15 rounds on the year ... Named to the 2022-23 American Athletic Conference All-Academic Team … Earned GCAA All-America Scholar honors for the 2022-23 academic year.

As a Senior (2021-22): Competed in nine events during the season earning a letter ... Finished the season with a scoring average of a 73.56 which was third-best on the team ... Carded a career-low 4-under 72 in the third round of the Irish Creek Intercollegiate ... Tied for 13th and 15th place finishes in the ECU Intercollegiate and Irish Creek Intercollegiate respectively ... Earned GCAA All-America Scholar honors for the second consecutive season.

Before East Carolina: North Carolina Amateur Match Play Qualifier Medalist (July 2022) ... Three-year letterman at Wingate University (2018-21) ... Played in 18 events during his three seasons for the Bulldogs and recorded four Top 10 finishes ... Earned GCAA All-America Scholars honors as a senior (2020-21) ... Received honorable mention All-South Atlantic Conference accolades as a junior (2019-20) ... Carded a school record low round of 65 as a junior ... Attended North Carolina State University as freshman but wasn’t on the men’s golf team.

High School: Four-year letterman for coach Jimmy Adams at D.H. Conley High School (Greenville, N.C.) ... Two-Time Eastern Carolina 3A/4A all-conference golfer ... Earned individual medalist honors at the 2017 TYGA Roy Jones Jr. Classic ... Runner-up at the 2017 Coastal Plains Junior Amateur ... Member of the National Honor Society ... Served as a Junior Marshal.

Personal: Full name is Nicolas Scott Brown ... Born June 17, 1999 in Raleigh, N.C. ... Son of Scott and Kim Brown ... Received his Bachelor of Science degree in management from Winthrop ... Pursuing a master’s degree in sustainable tourism.
